That's when I got the urge to run into the middle of their view. I just stood their for a few seconds, and already I was terrified. They weren't paying attention, so I decided to try and some other time. But that was only what I was thinking. Then I could hear voices.
         "RESHI, WHAT'S THAT BY YOU AND DEMI?" Curse Gina to find me out first. Now that she pointed me out, the rest of the girls were looking at me. This was as painful as being petrified by Medusa. All these eyes creeping up on me. My brain kept telling me that death was near, but my heart convinced my legs to stay put. I took a few gulps and they inched closer for examination. Then Reshi was concluding.
         "EW! THAT'S A BUG! I DON'T LIKE BUGS! GINA, KILL IT!"
         "ME?! WHY DO I HAVE TO KILL IT?! DEMI YOU KILL IT! YOUR CLOSER!"
         "YOU KNOW I'M AFRAID OF BUGS! SHEILA, YOU DON'T LOOK AFRAID. YOU SQUASH IT!"
         "NO!I DON'T WANT ITS JUICES UNDER MY FEET. MIKHAIL!"
         "DON'T PICK ME! I HATE BUGS!" They were all freaked out by me. This was my golden opportunity to get noticed.
         "I'm sorry to scare you, but-"
         "AH! IT TALKED!" Reshi screamed. Out of fear, she brought out her massive foot into the air, and dangled it above my head. It was full of grime and dirt, but the looks didn't matter. Before a chance for me to run was available, her brown sole pulverized me down into the carpet. Her sister then joined in on the crazed fun, as I was now being massively tortured and stomped on by the five sisters. stomp and stomp, the horrible smell was upon my flesh and bones. I watched as various sizes and shapes of each of their big feet were storming down upon my minuscule body. This couldn't have been any more painful, and I was very blessed when they stopped the tormenting. They crouched down to take a look at me.
         "IT IS DEAD?"
         "No...i'm not dead yet. I don't know why." The girls were afraid again. Reshi raised her foot into the air once more. I raised my voice a bit louder. "Wait! Please! just help me out. Please take me back into the house in front of you."
         "WHAT? WHY WOULD YOU WANT TO GO THERE? WHO ARE YOU, TINY BUG?"
         "RESHI!" Gina interrupted. "I THINK HE'S THAT TINY KID THAT LIVES ACROSS FROM US. I THINK HIS NAME WAS MIKEY." Reshi then picked me up and took a closer look at my body. She then figured out the truth.
         "IT IS YOU! BUT HOW DID YOU GET HERE?"
         "I can explain it later, but first you got to help me..."
         "NOT SO FAST, MIKEY. WE'RE BORED IN THIS HOUSE ALL DAY. NOW THAT YOU'RE HERE, THINGS MIGHT BE A BIT MORE EXCITING TODAY."
         "Where are you...going with this...?"
         "WE WANT TO PLAY A GAME. PLAY WITH US, AND THEN WE'LL HELP YOU."
         "What game?"
1122211211121.title: 50 Indian toes.

choices: Their mother arrives, interrupting the game.
One of the girls find you.
11222112111211.content:
Holding me with the index and thumb finger, Reishi said grinning:
"Let`s play hide and seek!"
"Sounds fine" I replied.
"Good!" Said Gina, the other sister. "We will count and you must hide from us."
"All of you will look for me?" I asked.
"Sure, little dumb" Said Demi, smiling. Mikhail, the young sister, was just giggling after all.
"That is the deal, Mikey", Sheila was saying: You try to hide from us, because if we find you, you go squish!
After that, all of the sisters laughed at me. Damn it. They have cute and pretty indian traces, but at that moment, they looked like goddess at a tiny doomed man.
"So, if I win, you will help me, right?" I asked kinda desperate.
"Yes, yes, sure" Reishi said like it was something unecessary.
"Very well then!" Said Sheila. "Better you run right now, because we gonna count on 20!"
The girls closed their eyes and started the count. My eyes scanned the perimeter, looking for a good point. For a minute, I forgot the goddess above me. I was wondering if they was peeking me, but it doesn`t matter. I found a good point under the couch. Also, I found a pair of slippers and a keds shoe, but since their feet was dirty. The footwear was not the best idea. Then, I runned into the safe point as Gina`s voice was saying "18". When they finished, I was at the shadows.
"...19...20! Ready or not Mikey, here we go!" Said Reishi.
I felt the floor rumbled a little by the booming footsteps. I saw their giant bare feet steping firmly on the floor and for a moment, I was scary.
"Mikey... Oh, Mikey..."Sheila was singing. "Where are you?"
"Hehehe..." Gina was having fun too. "Come on out, little bug. There are five giantess girls looking for you at this house. It`s just a matter of time.
They was looking under the chairs and table. Mikhail was crawling near the tv and the phone.
"Come on little Mikey" She said with her child tone. "I wanna step on you too!"
Great. I was trapped in a house with five giantess kids, and they want to step on me with their dirty feet. You are very lucky, Mikey Shripo...
And suddenly, I heard Sheila`s voice singing again, as the floor rumbled:
"Fee-fi-fo-fum... I smell a little dumb... "
And Reishi joined:
"Fee-fi-fo-fum... Mikey will gonna stepped just for fun..."
I saw many girls feet walking, looking for me. I will be the hell if they find me. Suddenly, a pair of feet was close to me, like it could watch me trough the shadow. The toes was wiggling in delight of the game. For a moment, I could recognize that pair of feet. It must belong to Sheila. As she was wiggling her huge toes, I could see some toejam between them. I was hoping not make contact with it.
"Oh, is that little Mikey here?" She was saying with a mocking tone. "Better take a look!"
Damn! What can I do now?
11222112111211.title: Fee Fi Fo Fum

112221121112111.content:
Right before Shelia was about to kneel down and find Mikey to abuse his weakness, the giant front door opens and the mother came through. Edna was a mother of five who worked an early job taking calls from an international social service office. She was 38, and a mother of five. No one can really blame her when she comes home dead-beat tired and wanting nothing more but sleep. Even when I was around and she came home, she would never look anywhere else but her door, leading to a bed or couch.
         She came through the door with two bags of groceries, enough to last at least three days before the next run. All of her kids turned to look at her, and it gave me a quick chance to peek out and see Edna a little better. Her eyes were bagged as always, and she carried a slumped frown on her face. her eye shadow was very messy, as though she had to rub her eyes from dozing off numerous times. She looked at all her kids, and just gave a sigh.
         "GIRLS, HELP RESTOCK THE CABINETS, THEN GO TO YOUR ROOM. MOMMY'S EXTRA TIRED TODAY AND JUST NEEDS SOME QUIET."
         "AWW," Shelia whines. She was upset to know that she couldn't continue the game. "BUT WE WANT TO PLAY A BIT MORE..."
         "SHELIA, DON'T START WITH ME...! NOW PLEASE..."
         Shelia and the other sisters went right to the bags, grabbed them, and went into another room where the kitchen was. The kids must have feared her mother when she didn't get her time of rest. I thought Edna as your giant lifesaver, but the idea didn't last so long. I saw Edna coming towards the couch, which made me inch deeper into the darkness with the dust bunnies. She was wearing some worn-out sneakers. She planted both her shoes under the seat in which I was hiding. I wanted to come out and try and attract her attention, but that would be completely stupid. She is very tired and easily irritated. A tiny boy from the house across can be easily mistaken as a bug. I just stayed under her seat, thinking what my next move should be.
         Edna then began to get more comfortable. From my position, I could see Edna's massive fingers down on her sneakers, and started to untie the first shoe. It was quick and easy, and slowly slid her socked foot out, letting out a huge sigh of relief that her 'dogs were set free'. I couldn't handle the poison stench that leaked from her sneaker. Full of long hours of moist foot sweat and the scent of heated toes, her shoes could be death row for a guy my size. She wasn't done there. She then use her fingers to peel off the damp sock from her foot. She has a bit of a struggle because since she's been working for so long, her sock stuck to her foot. Putting some force into it, I could see the stickiness being broken, and her foot was relieved. Another big sigh. She then starts working on the other foot, and without wasting time, she was finally relaxed and barefooted in her comfy spot. She shoved her socks into her shoes, and when she stretched her legs out, it knocked her right shoe on its side. The crumbled sock fell out of its place, and I was staring into the opening of her sneaker. I couldn't even imagine how terrible it would be to be trapped in that shoe. The smell leaked out more. I could practically taste her sweaty foot in my mouth.
         After her stretch, she has her feet firmly on the carpet floor, gripping the fabric with her toes. She turns on the tv, and just sits there. I wonder now of what the next action should be. I don't want to be living under this couch forever. I'm just thinking about Anitak and how's she doing now. Being banished isn't all that great. I thought being back in the surface would be great, but my predicament is just terrible. I need to try and get noticed. Edna is mature and a reasonable woman. If I could get to her face or ear, she would have to notice who I am.
         I walk out of the couch around her left foot. Going through the middle would mean having to fight the disgusting sneaker smell. Passing by her foot, I notice all its textures: the veins that struck out; the stretched out wrinkles under her sole when she slightly lifted it; her long toes painted with a crusty red color. Looking at it, I would have tried my luck looking for help elsewhere, but the risk of running into one of the girls would be disastrous. I stand five inches away from her toes, making tiny movements. I look up at Edna, watching the television very still, with a bored and tired face. I think of how I should go about this. Distracted with my next steps, I wasn't quick enough to dodge the reach her toes make on the carpet fabrics. I get caught it in, and my body becomes squeezed between her big and second toe. My face is pressed against her dark brown skin, and my nose takes full impact of her foot. It was rank and incredibly musty. I could feel the toe jam forming in between. It was crusty and slightly sticky. I was in deep trouble.
         Every second, the grip would loosen and then a powerful squeeze would follow once more. Like a paddle ball, my face would keep imprinting between her sticky toes. my body itself was stuck, and it couldn't be released so easily from the constant toe wiggling. She stopped, but only to raise her feet on the other side of the couch. I was away from the floor, but now a few feet in the air, along with her other foot. The stench and aroma doubled, and she started to play with me between her toes. She didn't think much of me, but something from the foot that feels so good in her feet. She squeezed me even tighter, and started to rub my body on the sole of her other foot. My face going up and down on her winkles was quite bumpy, and it hurt at sometimes. I couldn't go on with this. I needed to act fast before this situation became worse. She stretched her foot out and my body got mushed against the arm of the couch. This could be my chance. I could try and get out from her long, gripping toes, or stick around and be prepared from something to worsen.
112221121112111.title: Edna, The Tiring Mother.

1122211211121112.content:
Even if I wanted to, it was near impossible to push out the sticky flesh of Edna's toes holding my body together. She was really into crushing the 'thing' between her toes. She made it her personal toy. Her own sense of amusement while mindlessly watching television. I tried to push and thrash my arms around, but each touch caused the reaction for more squeezing. Pretty soon, I was feeling like one of those squeeze-dolls with the popped-out for stressed patients.Her toes were moist with grimy sweat, and yeah I still couldn't managed to release myself from her clutch. I was on the couch. If I could just muster up the strength to jump on the cushion, I could crawl through the underlinings of the couch, reach her face, and get help. Angry or not, she wouldn't risk hurting me. I did nothing to cause anger to her. Or at least I knew I didn't
         Edna stopped stretching her legs out, relaxing her toes and away from the couch arm. I took in small breaths, recovering my lungs while not having to suck in much of the foot stench looming around him. She didn't have pretty smelling feet. They smell as musty and dry as the house. Like an old book that's been recently opened in over 50 years. What I didn't account for was the quick jerk in her knee. I was floating in the air by her toes, above the same gray carpet that screwed me over. If I jumped, I was sure to predict some broken bones. Edna's upper half then bended over itself. Her hands then appeared below my vision. They were holding one of her socks. The same one that she took off not too long ago. They were well worn. Purple, with a hole patch on the heel. I didn't like where things were going. Edna wiggled her moist, brown toes as she entered her foot back into humidity. I felt the wave of heat hit me at the entrance. The air was damp, and it got worse around the toe section. I wanted to believe that he was dreaming, but once his face was smashed hard against the darkening fabric, he fell into a fairly wet patch.
         I felt scared. Once I was released, I scurried into the deepest part of her sock, pushing myself to create a small pod space. She wouldn't be able to dig her toes where I was. I just look at her toes. Still wiggling in place, trying to warm itself up. These socks were very aggressive, and packed so much heat. The smell doubled its factor, and my nostrils were flaring with anguish to leave. I tried to crawl my way around to inspect either side, trying to find the easy way for the the hole in her heel. I was given good seconds before she shifted her foot again, resting on the couch once more and placing a sock in her other foot. I was trapped. I had a chance before, but that wasn't possible anymore. I was trapped in an Indian mother's sock, having to take in her third world odor and fear the size of her red-nailed toes.
         She tried to warm up her foot as much as she could. She rubbed her toes all around her sock to absorb any kind of heat that would give satisfaction. Not to my favor, her toes reacquainted themselves with me, picking me back up. She didn't let go this time. I was hers once again. As Edna watched her programs, I was being crushed by the power of her toes. Throwing me against her sock, only to pick me back up and abuse me. I tried to think better thoughts. One was that this was much better than being in the hands of one of her girls. They knew I was here. They knew, and they would be playing games with me and using me until they got sleepy, keeping me as a prisoner, and the day would start again. Their mother, on the other hand, didn't know I was here. To her, I was just some plaything to relieve her day. There was still a chance to get her attention and still get help.
         I couldn't see it, but I could start feeling the immense pressure when she squeezed soles against one another. My body slammed hard against the clad foot of hers, and was being rubbed up and down furiously. She was trying to make a fire out of me. I tried to use this chance to get to the heel, but my world was spinning. I couldn't see where I was going. I tried to grip my hands on her pinky toe, and it only caused me to break my arm. I became limp, trying to see if my arm would work again. Her feet then propped up on the couch, and I was falling alongside the sole, heading for the patch. Teased for almost making it, she planted her sole on the cushion, stomping me in the process of free-falling. She was now using her hands to pull off the sock. Why?
1122211211121112.title: Cold Feet

112222.content:
Snout's an intelligent creature. I'm sure he can wait. What I really need to do is cancel this party, or I won't survive the night! I climbed onto Mella's bedsheets, pacing my way to the top. When I got to the top, I saw her phone, sitting peacefully right there. I quickly jumped onto it, then looked back at the door. Mella was nowhere in sight. I had to hurry before she comes back, or I'm dead. I searched through her address list, and found the recent call from...Layla! I knew it a heartbeat it was her. She and Mella were the best of pals. They also had no trouble bullying me around whenever she visited. Now having her here for a week?! I need to cancel this get-together. I called her, and got ready to modify my voice.
         "HELLO?" I was to frightened to answer, but it was the only way."HELLO?"
         "Hi." I said in a high pitch voice.
         "WHO'S THIS?"
         "This is Mrs. Shripo." In my head, I was thinking, she'll never believe that!
         "HI, MRS. SHRIPO! HOW ARE YOU DOING?" She must be real dumb.
         "I'm doing just fine, Layla. I caught Mella planning some kind of party?"
         "IT WAS HER IDEA, MRS. SHRIPO! I HAD NOTHING TO DO WITH IT, SHE JUST INVITED ME!" She's so scared! Ha!
         "Yes, well, I just called to tell you that it's over."
         "SURE THING, MRS. SHRIPO. ANYTHING YOU SAY."
         "Another thing."
         "SURE THING, MRS. SHRIPO. WHAT IS IT?"
         "I also heard she was going to invite May, is this true?"
         "YES, MRS. SHRIPO."
         "Would you be so kind to call May and tell her the party's off?"
         "SURE THING, MRS. SHRIPO."
         "Thanks. That would be all-" I was cut off and brought into the air. I saw the person who caught was none other than Mella! She looked very irritated.
         "YOUR SO DEAD, MIKEY!"
         "I'm sorry!"
         "TOO LATE FOR APOLOGIES! YOUR GOING TO PAY!" She quickly got to her phone, talking with Layla.

         "HEY, LAYLA. LOOKS LIKE YOU'VE BEEN FOOLED."
         ...?
         "I MEAN MIKEY IMPERSONATED MY MOM, TRYING TO CANCEL OUR FUN."
         ...!
         "I KNOW! BUT DON'T YOU WORRY. HE WON'T BE GETTING OFF THAT EASILY." I was shaking in her fist, wondering what she was planning. "OK, SEE YOU AT 8." Then Mella hanged up, and tossed her phone to her bed. "WELL, MIKEY. YOU ALMOST GOT AWAY, BUT I WAS A BIT QUICKER."
         "Come on, Mella! Their staying here for a week?!"
         "QUIET, YOU! YOU ALREADY PISSED ME OFF. THEIR MY FRIENDS, AND SINCE WERE THE OLDER ONES IN THE HOUSE, YOUR GOING TO LISTEN TO US."          "I'll just stay in my room."
         "OH, NO."
         I was surprised. "What do you mean?"
         "I MEAN YOUR GOING TO STAY FOR THE PARTY."
         "I don't want to stay."
         "YES YOU ARE. THIS IS A PUNISHMENT. AND WERE GOING TO GET DRUNK. WHEN WERE DRUNK, WERE GOING TO DO STUFF TO YOU. TERRIBLE STUFF."
         "Please, Mella! Don't!"
         "TOO LATE! I MADE UP MY MIND! AND TO MAKE SURE YOU DON'T TRY TO ESCAPE..." She pulled out the gum she was chewing on, and stuck it on me.
         "What are you doing?!"
         "THIS IS THE ONLY WAY FOR YOU TO STAY IN PLACE!" She stuck me onto her door, and went downstairs. "SEE YOU AT EIGHT. HA!" I had to escape before eight. Did I succeed?

But maybe they'll play with me sexually, like... like..." I was awfully disgusted by the idea. I had to get out of this gum! I always knew Layla never liked me, but I didn't know it was this bad! Next, May started to talk. I had a thought that she might have liked me, so she might not do something so harshly to me.
         "I SAY WE PLAY GAMES WITH HIM!"

         "WELL WE CAN PLAY GAMES THAT'LL BE FUN AND THREATENING. LIKE HIDE AND SEEK. WHOEVER FINDS HIM GETS TO DO SOMETHING WITH HIM! AND MAYBE SOME OTHER GAMES LIKE THAT." I misunderstood her. I was scared once again.
         "WELL, GIRLS, WE GOT A WHOLE WEEK. MIKEY WILL BE HURT AT THE END OF THE WEEK. BUT I'LL THINK WE'LL START WITH..."

"THE TORTURING SOUNDS MORE THREATHENING, SO LET'S GO WITH THAT FIRST. LAYA, BRING OUT YOUR TOOLS!" I tried to run, but Layla didn't want me to miss one second of this. She carried me over to her bag, and inside the bag, I saw a bunch of medival equipment.

If I wasn't able to withstand her shoes, then I couldn't possible live long enough to be surrounded by her socks. She quickly took off her socks, and unraveled her sexy, yet smelly feet. I started to shed some tears, knowing this was more overwhelming then onions.

"I'LL DO IT!" I was really mad at what she said.

She unraveled the sock, and i was totally relieved of that. She took a seat down, and began to put back on her socks. I just watched as she was getting ready to punish me for no reason. Her toes grabbed me by the head, soaking my eyes with the burning foot sweat. She was bringing me over her massive shoe, letting me know that it smelled a million times worse than what I've experienced just seconds ago. I could've sworn I heard a whisper of "SORRY" from her. Was May feeling like she was begin peer pressured.

I was gagging all around. I then looked thourgh the opening of the hole, seeing May's stinky, socked foot ready to come back inside. Her toes pushed me down to the toe section.I hit the wall hard, and May's toes just stood there motionless. I could heard the girl's voices from outside.

MAY, FOR YOUR GREAT PERFORMANCE TONIGHT, YOU CAN SLEEP IN MY MOM'S ROOM."

I still couldn't believe she did all that to me! She didn't seem that mean whenever some of my relatives came to visit. Was all this just some big lie. Did anyone really liked me, or just liked my size. As soon as you heard May locking the door, she was beginning to panic.

112222211.title: Confession.

1122222112.content:
"Sorry, May, but having to love you while still being tortured in public is not the kind of love I would want. You may be beautiful and nice, but this is just pushing things too far. If you want me to love you, you got to promise that you won't torture me in front of others just because your ashamed of my size."
         "OH! IT'S NOT FAIR!" She seemed to be frustrated about everything. She wanted to love me, but having to do that while dealing with the criticism from everyone else could become annoying. "IT'S NOT FAIR THAT YOU HAVE TO BE THIS SMALL. IF YOU WEREN'T, THEN WE WOULDN'T BE HAVING THIS CONVERSATION. I CAN'T LOVE YOU LIKE THIS. DO YOU KNOW HOW MANY PEOPLE WOULD MAKE FUN OF ME IF THEY THOUGHT I WAS DATING AN ANT?"
         "Do you really care this much about popularity?"
         "WHAT'S THE BIG DEAL? YOU GET USED TO THIS KIND OF TORTURE EVERYDAY, DON'T YOU? WHY WOULD MY TORTURE BE ANY DIFFERENT?"
         "Because this isn't what love is built on! I want to be loved by a girl who is not ashamed of being around me and spending time with me. I want a girl who can love me with no hesitation, and not someone who can't express the love outside to the rest of the world. That is the kind of girl I want. I'm sorry May, but if you can't give me that, then I see no reason for us to go out."
         At that moment, May was starting too shed some tears. She told me that she fell in love with me five days after we met. That was at least 6 years ago. She had a crush on me for 6 years. After all that time, she finally found the courage to ask me out, and I reject her on the spot. I couldn't believe that I might have another chance at this, but at least it won't be a shameful love. Watching May cry from above was beginning to make me tearful as well. I could see that she was real upset from my decision. It was my intention to try and cheer her up. I wanted to put this behind us and become great friends instead. At least our relationship wouldn't be ruined much. I walked over to her rear, and patted her for comfort.
         "Please calm down, May. We might not be going out, but we can still be friends."
         She then turned to me with her mascara running down her cheeks. She didn't very happy as she was a few minutes ago. "FRIENDS? THERE'S NO NEED TO BE FRIENDS. ALL I WANTED WAS TO BE YOUR GIRLFRIEND, BUT YOU REJECTED ME WITH A HURTFUL SAYING. ALL I THINK OF YOU NOW IS A BUG. YOU BROKE MY HEART. SO NOW I WANT REVENGE TO BREAK YOURS. I WAS GOING TO LET YOU SLEEP PEA          CEFULLY TONIGHT, BUT NOW I JUST THINK YOU SHOULD SUFFER INSTEAD."
         She took a grip on my shackles, lifting me into the air. I shuffled my legs around, trying to find a surface to place them on. She was lowering down, back to her smelly, sweaty feet. Being close up to those huge soles made me feel insecure about my size, and the smell just burns my own sense of smell. She ties my shackles around her big toe, and I was left dangling underneath it. She lowered her foot, putting forceful pressure on my body. Her toe imprint was all greasy, and it left a large smudge of dirt on my face. She then swayed her foot around, dragging me along for the ride. I got dizzy, and then couldn't keep my head straight to find out I was right in her face.
         "HOW DOES IT FEEL TO BE MY BEAUTIFUL TOE RING? YOU LOOK SO CUTE. I JUST MIGHT KEEP YOU THERE."
         "Please, May! I don't want to be here with your feet! Let me go!"
         "SORRY, BUT MAYBE YOU SHOULD HAVE THOUGHT ABOUT BEING MY BOYFRIEND INSTEAD OF REJECTING ME. NOW IT'S TIME FOR US TO GET OUR SLEEP. WE GOT A BIG DAY AHEAD OF US." She then sat on the bed to put her socks back on. I watched in horror as I was about to enter her dirty sock, forced to spend the night underneath her sweaty toes. She pulled in the sock tight, and then squeezed her giant toes around me, All I could see was the soaked fabric of the sock and her blue-colored toenails. "GOODNIGHT, MIKEY. SEE YOU IN THE MORNING."

         I don't know how many hours have passed, but my situation didn't change at all. I was still stuck under her toes, having to smell the heavy scent of her terrible foot odor. Every ten minutes, she would punish me by squeezing her toes around my body. Her disgusting foot sweat finally reached the point where it soaked my clothes. She pressed my face against the yellow-stained sock, where I was made to whiff a most incredible stench to horrible to believe. I tried to untie the loop she made with the shackles, but her toe was simply too big. I couldn't believe a girl this beautiful would have such intoxicating feet. I had to admit, her feet were beautiful along with her. I just couldn't handle the way her feet are so big and dangerous. Now that she was angry, she could use that reckless destruction into action. Her feet smothered my sense of smell and taste, and close to sight. Her foot sweat was staring to blur my vision, and soon I was out cold.
         When I woke up again, it was morning. I could see that May was waking up at the same moment, too. She stretched her toes out, and then squeezed them together, forgetting that I was still captive. She then peeled of her moist sock, revealing my sweaty body overnight. She released me from my loop, and the held me up to her face.
         "GOOD MORNING, MIKEY. HAD A NICE SLEEP? I HOPE YOU DIDN'T. HE HE." She then did something disastrous and rub my face against her sweaty soles. I connected with her feet once again. Just as she was enjoying my use, Mella came inside the room.
         "GOOD MORNING, MAY. GET READY. WE'RE GOING TO THE..."

She turned on the lights, and I could see that her shoes were organized in boxes. Heels were placed on the left, and sandals were stored on the right. We made an agreement that I would be out of here if I liked her shoe clean. Was it because I did a horrible job or that she didn't remember that she left me in here. I didn't want to fall into the deep layer of the insole because I would probably be pounded under her massive sole. Only these kinds of scary situations happen to me. No one else has to go what I deal with everyday to survive. I couldn't stop staring at her toes. They were freshly pedicured, but a little crusty on the nails. Every time they spread apart, a cheesy aroma fills the shoe. I could only gag at each time I smell her feet. Then I start to feel her feet move. I watch her foot rise into the air, then slam hard on the insole. God know what would happen if I slipped in. I couldn't keep my balance and accidently slip into the center of her sole.

Her foot was just too heavy to withstand. The smell was really atrocious, and the sweat was becoming more productive. I was wondering whether she felt me being crushed under her massive sole, but she didn't even stop to check. I was probably too tiny to be noticeable under a giant woman's foot. In just a couple of minutes, I could hear the car starting, and before I even knew the engine was on, I was pressed on harshly. It came to my senses that I was on the gas pedal foot. Her fat sole kept squeezing my body at reasonable rate. She wouldn't change her pressure for a while, which allowed all her sweat to flow onto my clothes. I could taste the flavorless sweat as it comes into my mouth. I was starting to slide a little bit more, and I was almost close to the heel. Her foot was very crusty, and could really use some smooth foot cream. My body was being compressed in unimaginable levels. I Could feel myself becoming more and more weightless, since she was squishing all the muscles out of me. She finally stopped her weight, and rested her feet. In the meantime, she raised her foot and tilted it toward her toes. I could hear her fingers scratching her ankle, right until I slid back down near the toe section.
         Sliding around all over her shoe was become a little irritating. I was almost close to the tip of the shoe, but I got stuck between her third and fourth toe. She finally but her foot down, and the ball of her foot held my lower body in place. I was now facing her gigantic toes, which smelled much worse than anywhere else in the shoe. She then again put more pressure into the pedal, and I was in tremendous pain. Her toe print was rubbing against my face, getting it all greasy. I wanted to get out of here so bad. I wanted to go back home and relax in my room, but instead I was sentenced to suffer with my mother's big feet because of a punishment for skipping school. I try to push her fourth toe off of me, but it was too strong to even try. I just laid there, giving her the advantage to rub her greasy, sweaty toes right in my face. All I got was a mouthful of sticky toe jam and foot sweat. I was hoping that she could just let her shoe off for just a moment, giving me a short chance to escape. Instead of dreaming, I was hoping to make it a reality. My will strengthen inside me, and I tried once more to push her toes off of me. The effort was futile, and it only aggravated her toes. They grabbed me by the neck, and squeezed me with such unbelievable force. I couldn't breath much, and I fainted.

         I quickly opened my eyes, realizing that I fainted inside of my mother's work shoes. I saw my mom's toes in full view, but now they were sweatier than ever. She must be already working. I didn't want to make any sudden movements, in order to not get the attention of her toes again. I needed a plan to get me out of here, but nothing seemed possible. Then when all hope was lost, my mother finally pulled out her foot from the shoe. Now was my big chance to find help. But she was at work, and probably I wouldn't get much success than staying in her shoe and wait to be brought back home. Should I have waited inside the shoe till she went back home, or just go outside and try to get her attention personally?

         "Whatever you say, mom." Now instead of eating your waffles peacefully, I had to gobble them up in a flash. Minutes later, I finished my meal, not even feeling the satisfying flavor on my taste buds.
         "GOOD JOB, HONEY. NOW LET'S GET TO THE CAR." I jump onto my mother's hand and wander off to the car.

         I see before me my mom's cherry-red toyota. She first buckles me up in the passenger seat. After she makes sure I'm tight enough to not get loose, she locks the door and walks to the driver's seat. She starts the car and begins driving. It was silent for the first 15 minutes, until I spoken up.
         "Mom?"
         "YES, DEAR?"
         "Can you turn on the radio?"
         "SURE." She changed to my favorite station. It still felt quiet, so I kept on talking.
         "Mom, I still don't understand why I need to go to an all-girl school. What's wrong with a normal high school?"
         "WELL, SWEETIE, YOU KNOW HOW BOYS CAN BE. THEY CAN BE ROUGH, DANGEROUS, CAUSE TROUBLE, UNTRUSTING, LYING, CAN'T TAKE CARE OF A FAMILY, NO GOOD, SON OF A BI-"

         "Whatever you say." Few minutes later, I saw the School grounds."This didn't look anything like the brochure. There was a storm in the area."
         "HMM, MUST BE A QUICK WEATHER CHANGE... WELL JUST BECAUSE IT DOESN'T LOOK NICE, DOESN'T MEAN IT'S DANGEROUS. SHEESH MIKEY, YOU CAN BE SO JUDGING SOMETIMES."
         "Sorry mom"
         "WELL WERE NOT GOING TO GREET THE PRINCIPLE IN HERE. LET'S GO." So me and my mom went inside.

         As we entered the educational building, the first thing I noticed was the girls, staring at me. I heard some of their gossip-filled voices.

         "WHO'S THE FREAK?"
         "I HOPE HE'S NOT GOING TO ENROLL HERE. HE COULDN'T SURVIVE THE DAY." I was feeling a little sad inside, hearing all the insults. It wasn't long until I was inside the main office. I see an annoyed blonde chewing on some bubble gum.
         "UMM, EXCUSE ME?" My mom asked. The blonde was just chewing her gum. "HELLO?" The blonde was still chewing! "HEL-"
         "OMG! WHAT DO YOU NEED?!"
         "I JUST WANT TO KNOW WHERE THE PRINCIPLE'S OFFICE IS.."
         "DOWN THE HALL, SECOND DOOR TO THE RIGHT! NOW LET ME BE!"
         "OK! OK!" My mom walk down the hall in anger. "WHAT'S HER PROBLEM?" "I don't know, mom. Let's just keep going. Maybe the principle would be a little nicer."
         "SHE BETTER BE!" Then you both proceed through the door.

         "UMM...HELLO?"
         "OH, HELLO. YOU MUST MS. SHRIPO. I'M MS. LOLLI."
         "HELLO MS. LOLLI."
         "NOW WHERE'S THE NEW GUY?" My mom lifted me, and I saw a hispanic lady in shock. "WHY, HE'S JUST AN INCH TALL!"
         "YES, I KNOW"
         "YOU KNOW I HEARD OF ANOTHER KID WHO WAS AS SMALL AS HIM." I was amazed! Was there really another kid who has lived the life of being one inch tall?!
         "REALLY, MS.LOLLI?"
         "I'M SURE. HIS NAME WAS UMM...UHH.... OH YEA. PHIL BEMINE. I DIDN'T KNOW MUCH ABOUT HIM, THOUGH. HE WENT TO ANOTHER ALL-GIRLS SCHOOL. I DON'T KNOW WHAT HAPPENED TO HIM EITHER. HE PROBABLY DROPPED OUT OR GRADUATED OR SOMETHING."
         "OK THEN."

"I WILL ALLOW YOU TO PICK YOUR PARTNERS. YOU GIRLS SEEM TOO OLD AND BEAUTIFUL TO HAVE ME PICK FOR YOU." All around the room, the girls got up, switch seats with one another, and were quickly paired up.
         "MIKEY," I turned around, seeing Edna with a question.
         "Yeah?"
         "WANT TO BE MY PARTNER?"
         "Sure."
         "COOL." I just met this girl, and she already wants to be paired with me! The class was talking for a while until Ms. Martinez explained the rules.
         "OK, CLASS. THE OBJECTIVE OF THIS LESSON IS TO WORK WITH YOUR PARTNER TO MAKE UP AS MANY WORDS AS YOU CAN WITH THE SCRAMBLE OF WORDS ON THE BOARD." I stared at the board, trying to get ahead of everyone. "FIRST PAIR WHO MAKES UP THE MOST WORDS, GET NO HOMEWORK FOR TWO DAYS." The class started to mumble among themselves. "YOU MAY START...NOW!"

         The class was filled with non-stop talking. Edna and me were looking back and forth at the board, gaining another two words each time. I thought of this as a perfect time to get to know her better.
         "Edna?"
         "YES, MIKEY?" I didn't know what else to say.
         "So, um, do you like this school?"
         "OH MY GOD, IT'S THE BEST SCHOOL I'VE BEEN TOO! I HAVE SO MANY FRIENDS HERE, AND MOST OF THE TEACHER'S HERE ARE SO NICE."
         "I see."
         "WHAT ABOUT YOU? DO YOU LIKE IT HERE?"
         "So far, so good."
         "THAT'S GOOD TO HEAR. HOW MANY FRIENDS YOU'VE MADE SO FAR?"
         "None, except you."
         "YOU'LL GET MORE. JUST GIVE IT SOME TIME." That made me feel better.
         "Thanks. Do you have any best friends?"
         "JUST TWO. ONE HAS BEEN MY FRIEND FOR A LONG TIME. THE OTHER I JUST MET THIS YEAR."
         "That's alot of years."
         "I GUESS SO."
         "Yeah." We spend another 3 minutes looking for more words to put in our collection.
         "I GOT A QUESTION FOR YOU."
         "Shoot."
         "WHY ARE YOU IN AN ALL-GIRLS SCHOOL? DOESN'T THAT SEEM A LITTLE OUT OF ORDER."
         "I thought so too, but my mom thinks girls are more caring and nicer."
         "YOUR MOM SOUNDS LIKE A SMART WOMEN." We both started to laugh. I was starting to like Edna. She was cool, calm, and beautiful.
         "OKAY, CLASS." Ms. Martinez got off her stool. "TIME'S UP. LET'S SEE WHO FOUND THE MOST." Edna counted up how many words we made. In a couple of seconds, we all told Ms. Martinez how many words each of us got. We could have one, but another group found more words than us. As soon as that was over, the bell rang. Next class.

         I sat on Edna's shoulder as she was walking out of the classroom.
         "SO WHERE YOU OFF TO NOW?"
         "I think a reading class. You?"
         "BIOLOGY."
         "Ok." She set me down. We were ready to part ways, until she asked.
         "MIKEY?"
         "Yeah?"
         "I WAS WONDERING IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO COME OVER TO MY HOUSE THIS AFTERNOON?" Of course I wanted to go, but I was feeling real tired, and just wanted to chill at home. My beanbag chair is waiting.
         "I don't know.."
         "I'LL LET YOU TRY OUT MY NEW BEAN-BAG CHAIR.." I just had to say...
1131311.title: The Joys of Choosing.

11313111.content:
"Sure. I think that I would like to come over.'
         "REALLY? OH, HOW COOL! I'LL SEE YOU AFTER SCHOOL THEN." She walk down the hall and made a corner to her next class. I was over excited with joy, and was waiting for a friendship like this. I called my mom right away, and she agreed that I could go to Edna's house as long as her mom could take me back home before night falls. Now I was in my classes, thinking about how fun it would be at her place. We would probably sit around, talking about all kinds of cool stuff. We could enjoy food that her mom gladly makes for us. We could even visit the park and have some fun in the community pool. These thoughts were with me throughout all my classes, and I didn't pay attention to the lectures or presentations at all. I didn't think I would be this excited, but this was my first friend in this school. I couldn't wait till the bell rang.
         As the final bell rang, everyone was rushing out of the classroom for their transportation vehicles. I waited till the halls were calm, and ran out into the front entrance of the school. There I met up with Edna, who was glad to see me safe and unharmed.
         "THERE YOU ARE. I THOUGHT YOU WERE NOT COMING."
         "Of course I was coming. I wouldn't ditch a friend like you. Now let's get going before the day dies."
         "YOU SAID IT." I jumped into the palm of her hand as we entered into her car. Her mom was driving us back home. She introduced me to her, and I could tell that the relationship was going to be successful. Her mom actually didn't mind about my size. She really thought that I was cute and charming. I was happily laying on her lap as we all talked and socialized in the car. Their personalities were very similar, and they suited my taste in a women.
         We finally got to the house, and we were all excited for my first arrival. They have good guest manners, such as showing me around the house and offering me some afternoon snacks. When all seemed to have calmed down, me and Edna chilled out in her room. We just sat around talking some more. I was really getting to know her better by the minute. I was starting to feel attractive to her the more time I was around her. She had a very alluring perfume and a very pretty face. I watched as she just kept talking about her hopes and dreams. I didn't know what she was going with that, but at least she was pretty.
         "OH YEAH. I FORGOT TO TELL YOU. I INVITED A FRIEND OVER TO HANG WITH US. IS THAT OKAY WITH YOU?"
         "Sure. I don't mind." She then checks her phone and squeals.
         "GREAT! BECAUSE SHES COMING UP RIGHT NOW." I stare at the door, and in comes a girl I couldn't believe. Was she nice?

         "WOW! YOU ANSWERED THAT FAST! YOUR ALREADY BECOMING A TOP STUDENT! KEEP PAYING ATTENTION."
         "Yes, miss."

***45 minutes later***

         Just one more minute and the class is over! "There's too much distractions in here. What else can go wrong?"
         "OK CLASS IS ALMOST OVER, SO PACK UP AN- WOAHHH!" I look up and see a couple of chi-chi's, ready to land on me.
         "Ahh!" I get myself squeezed between into her boobs.
         "OH,MIKEY! UM, CLASS IS OVER. EVERYONE GET OUT!" The class left in a hurry. "MIKEY, I'M SO SORRY."
         "It's alright. can I just get to my next class?"
         "RIGHT, AND WHERE IS THAT?"
         "I think it's..."
1132.title: Boob alert.

11321.content:
"It's gym for me."
         "UHH..." Ms. Tamal sounded surprised.
         "What's wrong?"
         "WELL... WOULDN'T YOU PERFER FOR A SCHEDULE CHANGE?"
         "Why would I change? it's just gym."
         "ARE YOU KIDDING?! YOU WOULD GET SQUISHED TO A PULP AT ONE OF THEIR ACTIVITIES, ESPECIALLY AT YOUR SIZE!"
         "Though it may sound difficult, I still have to try."
         "I WARNED YOU. HOP ON." She opened her palm for me, ready to teleport me to the gym. She began to walk down the hall. "JUST TO LET YOU KNOW, WERE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR INJURIES."
         "It's alright. I think I'll end up ok."

         I was standing before the dome, known as the gymnasium. "Well, wish me luck. Put me down."
         "IT'S YOUR DEATH." She places me on the gravel of the sidewalk, seeing the door slightly open. I was now heading towards the door, hoping everything will turn out great, and not Ms. Tamal's prediction. When inside, the room was slightly dim, with some of the lights busted.
         "Hello? I'm-I'm Mikey." Silence. "Um, this is my second period.." Still no sound. "Ms. Gerhard?" Suddenly, a whistle blew out of nowhere.
         "OK, GIRLS! SHOW OUR 'GUEST OF HONOR' HOW WE SAY HELLO TO NEWCOMERS!" Then light shined brighter, and I see many students on the bleacher, standing with a black ball in each hand. "GET READY.. GET SET.. DODGE!"
         Then all of a sudden, an avalanche of balls were heading toward my existence. The best all I can do was dodge, as the lady instructed. One dodge was easy, but the next was too brutal. After that, I've lost my balance, and was being trampled by every ball they tossed at me. Bruises were surrounding my whole body. The whistle was blown again. "OK, LADIES! ENOUGH!" Then everything stopped. I was lying flat on the floor, in pain. Then the instructor approached me.
         "Hi, my name's Mi-"
         "PATHETIC!" She blew her whistle close by, almost shattering my eardrums. "IF YOU WANT TO SURVIVE HERE, YOU BETTER FOLLOW EVERY ORDER I TELL YOU PERFECTLY. IF YOU DON'T.." She raised her Jordan's high above me, and then slammed it down with full force.
         "Ahhhh! Please get off me!"
         "IF YOU CAN GIVE ME TWENTY PUSH-UPS!" I tried to do at least one, but her weight outmatched me. "PATHETIC!" She kicked me into the shadows. "YOU STILL NEED SOME TRAINING. THE YEAR'S GOING TO BE HORRIBLE FOR YOU, BUT WILL GIVE YOU GREAT STRENGTH. MY NAME'S MS. GERHARD." She walked away from my presence. "I'LL GIVE THE GIRLS TIME TO INTRODUCE THEMSELVES." Ms. Gerhard also disappeared into the shadows. I've tried to catch up to her, but then a bunch of teenage girls crowded me.

         Three questions were mostly repeated again and again.
         "ARE YOU A HUMAN BUG?"
         "YOUR STILL ALIVE?"
         "ARE YOU SINGLE?" I was becoming irritated.
         "Will you all shut up?!"
         "WHO DO YOU THINK YOUR TALKING TO?!" Then all the girls stepped aside, allowing a path for another girl to walk up. "YOUR NOT THE BOSS OF US!" I saw this girl wearing nothing but socked feet, letting out a powerful stench.
         "There ain't going to be anyone to boss around with the stench of your foot knocking out people." The audience oohed in shock.
         "SO YOU DON'T LIKE A LITTLE FOOT STENCH?" She developed a sinister grin on her lips. She raised her foot, and slammed it down on my body.
         "Ugh! get off me! They reek!"
         "OH, YOU THINK THEY REEK NOW, BUT WAIT TILL I DO THIS.." She then squeezed her toes, having them printed on my face. Nothing invaded my mouth, except the taste of socked foot lint, and some flavoring of foot sweat. Then a bell rung, which meant it was time for next class. "SEE YOU TOMORROW, BUG!" She tossed me back into the shadows. I watched as the girls leaving the dome, watching them turning and giggling at me. I was getting ready to grab my materials and get to my next class, until my pencil rolled into a lit room, and I followed it.

         I found the pencil had lead me into a mini office, and Ms. Gerhard was sitting on a metal chair. I see the pencil near her feet, that were now released from her sneakers. "I can do this!" I held in my breathe, and stormed in. I successfully grabbed my pencil, but was captured by the grasp of Ms. Gerhard putrid feet. "Not again!"
         "NICE TRY, KID. YOU STILL GOT SOME WORK TO DO." I find Ms. Gerhard staring at me, then placing me on her desk. "I SEE YOU HAVE A GREAT WEAKNESS, THE SMELL OF FEET."
         "So what if I do? I can still do stuff."
         "OH REALLY?" Ms. Gerhard looked around. "THEN YOU WOULDN'T MIND TO GET ME THAT PAPER CLIP."
         "Of course I won't." I was heading for the paper clip, until I see Ms. Gerhard's feet trapping it beneath her socked toes.
         "COME ON, MIKEY. I'M WAITING." I held in my breath once again, and charged in. I quickly dug under her toes, searching until I found the paper clip. I grabbed it, but then I was panicking for air. I took a small breathing, but it was enough. I had no choice but gasp, and was instantly knocked out. It wasn't long until Ms. Gerhard figured out I've failed. "SEE? THIS WEAKNESS NEEDS TO BE CONQUERED. BUT I CAN BE ABLE TO HELP."
         "How?"
         "WELL THESE TWO ACTIVITIES WILL HELP YOU, BUT YOU CAN ONLY PICK ONE."
         "Well what are they?"
         "ONE IS KICKBALL, WHILE THE OTHER IS THE ART OF WRESTLING." I thought about each one carefully.
         "I think I'll chose..."
11321.title: Physical Education time.

113211.content:
I gave this some precious time, thinking which one will be more helpful and less painful. "Kickball sounds reasonable."
         "ARE YOU SERIOUS? I THOUGHT YOU WOULD HAVE CHOSE WRESTLING, BUT OK."
         "Why wrestling? Isn't it more painful than kickball?"
         "OF COURSE. BUT I THOUGHT YOU WERE THE TYPE OF PERSON WHO DOES STUFF THE HARD WAY."
         "Oh. Well, um, I'm not."
         "SUIT YOURSELF." I was silent, looking around at the surrounding equipment. "SO I GUESS YOU GOT TO GET GOING TO CLASS. I CAN'T WRITE YOU A PASS, SINCE I RAN OUT."
         "It's okay. Hey coach?"
         "YEAH?"
         "Who's the girl, that wears only socks?"
         "YOU MEAN MELISSA? ONE OF MY STAR PUPILS, THAT'S WHO. WHY? DID YOU MEET HER?"
         "Yeah, but she was real mean."
         "YEAH, SHE CAN BE A BIT BOSSY, AND THAT'S ONE REASON WHY SHE'S THE LEADER OF THIS PERIOD'S GYM CLASS."
         "Oh, well I hope we'll get along soon."
         "KEEP DREAMING. MELISSA CAN BE A BIT OF A HARD SHELL TO CRACK."
         "But why is she like that?"
         "NO ONE KNOWS. SHE JUST THAT MYSTERIOUS."
         "Well I'm going to find out, no matter how mean she is."
         "I WISH YOU THE BEST OF LUCK. NOW GET GOING TO CLASS."
         "Okay, Ms. Gerhard." I jumped off her desk, walking out of the room, thinking how tomorrow will be, if things will get a little more better or worse.

***6 hours later***

         I hopped into my mom's car, as she dropped by to pick me up. "HOW WAS SCHOOL, HONEY?"
         "It was good."
         "ANYTHING INTERESTING HAPPENED?"
         "Nothing much, except gym."
         "WHAT HAPPENED IN GYM? DID THEY HURT YOU??" My mom seemed like she was hyperventilating.
         "Mom, relax. Everything was all cool, until this girl came out and ruined everything."
         "WHAT GIRL?"
         "Her name's Melissa. She was real mean. But no worries. I'm going to embarrassed her in kickball tomorrow."
         "MIKEY DONNOR SHRIPO! THAT IS NO WAY TO GET BACK AT SOMEONE. INSTEAD OF REVENGE, TRYING TALKING TO HER."
         "Mom, that never works. It just makes everything all weird and awkward."
         "IT'S EITHER A TALK OR NOTHING. IF YOU TRY TO PULL ANYTHING, I SWEAR YOU'LL BE IN SERIOUS TROUBLE."
         "Okay, fine! I won't get revenge."
         "THAT'S WHAT I WANT TO HEAR. NOW GET READY, WERE ALMOST HOME." I got my belongings together, as we hang a turn onto the driveway. My mom opened my said of the car, and there appeared Snout, looking excited and happy as ever.
         "Hey, boy! How you doing?" Snout gave me many licks. "I'm going to my room and drop my stuff inside."
         "OK, SWEETIE."
         "Let's go, Snout!" Snout scampered into the house, until Mella blocked the way. "Hey! What's the big deal?"
         "QUIET, TWERP. I GOT SOME MAIL FROM SOME GIRLS, SAYING TO GIVE THIS DIRECTLY TO YOU. IT SMELL FUNNY, SO I DIDN'T OPEN IT." She handed the envelope to me, with a terrible smell attached to it.
         "Ok, I guess I'll get going then."
         "WHATEVER." She walked to the couch, turning her attention to the t.v.
         "Ok, Snout. Let's continue." Snout continued his path, and we entered my room, without any disruptions. I dropped my bag near the cabinet, and went back to Snout. "Thanks, boy. I can take it from here." Snout let your presence. "Now let's open that envelope." The stench was just too strong to ignore. I just had to open it. I ripped the seal, revealing a messy letter. It stated:

DEAR, BUG
I HEARD YOU GOT INTO THE KICKBALL TEAM NOW.
WELL LET ME JUST SAY IT'S GOING TO BE HELL FOR YOU WITH ME AROUND. LOOKS LIKE YOU'VE MADE A BIG MISTAKE.
SEE YOU IN PRACTICE, BUG!
LOVE, MELISSA
P.S. I WROTE THIS WITH MY TOEJAM, JUST FOR YOU. HA!

         "Ugh! I can't believe I touch it!" I was trying to wipe the grime off my hands. "She's so dirty. I can't believe her!" As I was wiping myself, I kept my mind on the letter. "A threat letter? Ha! She going to do a lot more than a crappy letter to scare me! Because Mikey Shripo doesn't run! I don't care what mom says! I'm going to get revenge on her! I'm too tough to be scared!"
         "MIKEY, IT'S CANDYLAND TIME!"
         "Coming, mom!" As I was walking towards the door, I was focusing on sweet revenge tomorrow. "Just wait, Melissa. Just wait..."

***The next day***

         The bell rang, meaning it's the end of 1st period. I was pumped up for kickball this morning. Then all of a sudden, Ms. Tamal called me back in. "MIKEY, CAN YOU COME HERE FOR A MOMENT?" I walked towards her desk, allowing her to pick me up.
         "Yes?"
         "I JUST WANTED TO ASK HOW GYM WAS YESTERDAY."
         "Oh, it was great."
         "SO NO ONE MADE FUN OF YOU?"
         "Nope."
         "HUMILIATED YOU?"
         "Nope."
         "TORTURE Y-"
         "Well look at the time! It looks like I'm going to be late."
         "IS EVERYTHING ALL RIGHT? YOU SEEM A BIT TENSE."
         "Nope. I just fine, Ms. Tamal. Really. Can I just get to my class?"
         "WHATEVER YOU SAY." She once again carried me to class, dropping me in the same spot. I thanked her and went on my way. When I got inside, I saw balls flying all over the place. I saw Ms. Gerhard at the corner, and turn my direction there. As I was walking, I was temporarily stepped on. I looked up, seeing Melissa's devilish face.
         "SEE YOU IN THE GAME, BUG!" She and her posse giggled away. I continued to Ms. Gerhard, letting her know I was here.
         "AH, MIKEY, YOUR HERE. THIS IS GREAT, BECAUSE WE WERE JUST UNEVEN. NOW WITH YOU, WE CAN START THE GAME."
         "What about warm-up?"
         "WE ALREADY DID THAT, YOU JUST WASN'T HERE." I turned my back.
         "Damn it, Ms. Tamal!"
         "WHAT WAS THAT?"
         "Nothing. Just nothing. Let's get this game started!"
         "THAT'S THE SPIRIT! NOW THERE'S YOUR TEAM OVER THERE." I turned to see a couple of sluggers on the benches. I paced over there to introduce myself.
         "Hey guys."
         "OH GREAT. WE GET THE BUG."
         "Hey! Just because I'm small doesn't mean I'm not useful."
         "WHATEVER, BUG. IT WOULDN'T MATTER HOW GOOD YOU ARE. YOUR STILL NO MATCH FOR THE OTHER TEAM. WE HAVEN'T ONE A GAME."
         "Well, today's a new day. Anything can happen."
         "THEN PROVE IT TO US, BECAUSE YOUR FIRST TO KICK."
         "I'll show you guys." I walk to the base, seeing Melissa pitching.
         "GOOD LUCk, BUG!" She rolled the ball. It was coming too fast for me. Before I a chance for a runner-up, I was trampled.
         "BALL 1!" Yelled the umpire behind me.
         "I was just getting started."
         "RIGHT. WELL TRY THIS ONE, BUG!" She tossed it again, even faster than before. I was trampled again.
         "BALL 2!"
         "WILL YOU JUST KICK THE BALL, BUG?!"
         "I'm trying. Maybe if you just stop rolling it too hard!"
         "HARD?! I'LL SHOW YOU HARD!" Melissa tossed the ball at a incredible force. I was having a head concussion for the impact.
         "BALL 3! WALK!" As I walking to first base, I heard my teammates.
         "HEY, MAYBE YOU MIGHT GET US TO WIN THIS TIME." I safely got to second base.
         "Well I least got my team's trust. But how long can I keep this up?"

***45 minutes later***

         Just 5 minutes from the bell from ringing. It was the last break, just what I needed. I been pulverized by the ball for so much, I feel like my face has deformed. Now only was I was a horrible kicker, but I lacked endurance too. The score was tied, 3-3. As I was icing my body with a block of ice, Melissa and her posse appeared. "HEY, BUG. YOU LOOK SORE. HA!" The group started laughing.
         "What do you want, Melissa?"
         "I WANT TO MAKE A DEAL WITH YOU." I was stunned.
         "What kind of deal?"
         "LIKE A 'WHO WINS THIS?' DEAL. IF YOU WIN, I'LL STOP TORTURING YOU FOR A WEEK."
         "And if you win?"
         "YOU WILL HAVE TO SPEND THE DAY IN MY LOVELY TOES AND SOCK."
         "No way!"
         "FINE. SOUNDS LIKE YOU HAVE NO FAITH IN YOUR TEAM."
         "I do have faith in them. We've gone far enough to get in tie."
         "THEN IT WOULDN'T BE A PROBLEM MAKING A BET." I had a feeling she was trying to trick me, but I couldn't resist a bet.
         "Fine. I'll accept your bet."
         "THAT'S MORE LIKE IT. MY TOES WILL BE WAITING. GOOD LUCK, BUG!" I went back to my team, seeing if I can motivate them, but coach blew the whistle, indicating it was time to finish up.
***5 minutes***

         It was a pretty intense game. The winners were...
113211.title: 1st day of Kickball practice

choices: "OF COURSE. I NEVER BREAK MY PROMISE."
1132112.content:
"A DEAL'S A DEAL'S, BUG. TIME FOR YOU TO PAY THE ULTIMATE PRICE!"
         "Come on Melissa! Have a heart! two our of three?"
         "OH NO! YOUR GOING IN THERE, EITHER YOU LIKE IT OR NOT!" As Melissa was dropping me into her moisturized sock, I was thinking how the heck she won that game...

***Flashback***

         Coach Gerhard's whistle was blown, meaning it was time to play ball. Melissa's team was playing outfield, and of course my team was kicking. I was up to kick first. I was pumped up for this throw, knowing I will kick it this time! Melissa rolled the ball at me, tumbling me over.
         "BALL 1!"
         "COME ON!" Melissa sounded furious.
         "Don't lose your temper.." My team was giggling at the sidelines. Even Melissa's team started to crack up.
         "JUST YOU WAIT.." She rolled the ball again, tumbling me over once again.
         "BALL 2!" I got back on my feet, knowing this game's in the bag for me. Melissa gave me no time to recover, and rolled the ball once again. The last tumble let me walk to first base.
         "Looks like I'm going to win."
         "DON'T GET YOUR HOPES UP." I was standing in first base, watching how the team's going to do, and keeping a close eye on Melissa, thinking she's got something planned. The next two kicks were just fantastic, thanks to Jodie & Carrie. I was right on third base, and the other two were occupied by Jodie and Carrie, meaning the bases were loaded. The kicker that who was recently the important one was Lexy. She was our best kicker on the team, so I was jumping in glee. Her glorious kick was fantastic, and I ran all the way to home base. All of a sudden, the floors felt a little slippery.
         "What's going on?" I slid out of control, facing the wrong direction.
         "MIKEY, WHAT ARE YOU DOING? HOME BASE IS THAT WAY. TURN AROUND!" Jodie kicked into the right direction, but I was still out of control. I passed home base, but didn't touch it. "MIKEY, IF YOU DON'T TOUCH HOME BASE, NONE OF US CAN!" I got back on my feet, and quickly ran towards the goal. I saw Melissa coming quick, seeing the dark ball in her hands. I ran as fast as I could, but was too late. I saw Melissa's sock already on top of the base.
         "OUT!" I tried to stop, but instead, I collided with Melissa's socked foot. She placed her foot on top of me, trapping me in her filth. Under her foot, I could hear the groans and complaints of my teammates.
         "I failed them." Then Melissa took her foot of me, and I ran to Coach Gerhard. "Coach, she cheated!" Everyone gasped in surprise as I pointed towards Melissa.
         "WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT MICKY? SHE WON FAIR AND SQUARE."
         "No. Because when I was heading for home base, I started slipping."
         "IS THAT HER FAULT?"
         "Yes, because she put grease all around that area, so I can slip, allowing her to catch up to home base."
         "DO YOU HAVE ANY PROOF?"
         "If you can just feel the spot, then you'd know I'm telling the truth."
         "OK." We all walked to the scene of the crime, looking back at Melissa, giving me a dirty look. I saw Coach Gerhard feeling the floor, then calling me over. "MIKEY, FEEL IT." I did as I was told and touched the floor. Unbelievable! There was nothing greasy there! "NOW, I WOULD LIKE FOR YOU TO APOLOGIZE TO MELISSA."
         "OH, ITS OKAY, COACH. I KNOW MIKEY FEELS SORRY. I KNOW HE'LL MAKE IT UP TO ME SOMEHOW." She wiggled her toes, giving me something to fear. Everyone started to walk back to the benches, as the bell rang. I was walking until Melissa snatched me into her fingers...

***Flashback***

         I landed inside her putrid sock, terrified by my surroundings. "How long am I in here?"
         "UNTIL THE END OF THE DAY. DON'T EXPECT ANY BREAKS, BECAUSE I'M ENJOYING EVERY SECOND OF THIS."
         "I know you put grease on the field."
         "SO WHAT IF I DID? IT'S GONE, EVERYONE THINKS YOUR A LIAR. PLUS, YOUR TEAM HATES YOU FOR LOSING THE GAME. YOUR ALL ALONE." I felt a little guilt inside for losing. "BUT DON'T FEEL BAD. I KNOW WHO CARES ABOUT YOU." Just as she said that, her foot and toes came into view. "MY LOVELY FEET. HAVE FUN."
         "Please!" She ignored me, and stuffed her foot inside. I was avoiding her toes, but they just wouldn't stop wiggling. I eventually got caught inside her third and fourth toe, stuck within her toejam. All day she just kept wiggling her toes, increasing the smell, taste, and pain for me. Later in the day, she placed me under the crevice of her toes, and squeezed all the sweat of her toes onto me. I just hope I could survive the day. Just as it was ready time to go home, she took off her sock, letting in a little amount of clean oxygen.
         "YOUR REALLY GREAT KEEPING MY TOES HAPPY."
         "Can I go home now?"
         "LET ME THINK..."
1132112.title: Deal's a Deal.

11321121.content:
"WELL, I WAS THINKING ABOUT LETTING YOU GO BACK HOME FOR THE DAY, BUT THEN I THOUGHT: WHY SHOULD I LISTEN TO SOMEONE WHO'S NOT EVEN BIGGER THAN MY BIG TOE?"
         My face sunk within itself. I was still rolling around in her sweaty sock, and a few tears were no longer caused by the smell or heat. "No...you can't do that! We had a deal!"
         "SORRY, MIKEY, BUT ANSWER ME SOMETHING." Melissa then scrunched up her sock, clumping my body in the mix, and rose me towards her face. "WHAT ARE YOU GOING TO DO ABOUT IT?"
         I looked at her dark grin, and wanted to scream a million things to her face. She was heartless. She was cruel. She was stupid and ugly. The way her autumn brown hair fell over one of her eyes, while a part of that hung by her ear. I hate admitting that she was looking cute for a tomboy, but for someone to be this evil to the new kid was incredibly frightening. I didn't know what this girl was capable of. She seemed to have control over the respect of her peers. Melissa was definitely a tough girl to go against, especially for one suffering under her sock. I didn't have any power to test her.
         "Nothing..."
         "NOTHING. COACH WAS RIGHT. YOU ARE PATHETIC. GLAD SOMEONE TOLD YOU SOONER. NOW." She dropped her grip on the sock, dropping me back all the way to the bottom of her flesh drench. I was met with a face full of a soaked sock. I looked back up, being acquainted again with the sight of her sweaty, meaty toes. "LET'S GO HOME, BUDDY"
         With one crazed laugh, she pulled the edge of her sock to her with full force, pushing her leg and foot against me, making sure that there was no way to avoid her stomp. Once her toes touched me, they didn't resist any temptation to grab onto my head and squeeze. Her big and second toe were very ruthless, crushing my skull with a scrunch, and finding my nose so that it could be pressed between them. It was taking it an entire site of a landfill full of socks and aging cheese. While my face was getting Melissa's greasy treatment, the rest of my foot made sure my body wasn't resting. Once she put on her slides, she did her best to smash the back of my body against her insole and any part of her sock that was spotted with her sweat.
         She made it her mission to make sure that I was hers now. She was dominating my body, and the day didn't even reach the sunset yet. I made a quick assumption that she lived close by the school, because she wasn't cruising on a bus or car. She was walking. Hard. Each stomp was like a candy cane crack to my bones. If I was still able to walk myself, it would've been a miracle. Periodically during her walk, and at times, run, she would let her toes spin my body to be facing the crevice of all her toe. I was usually facing her pinky toe, which luckily, wasn't the smelliest of them all. For some reason, it was the only toe that didn't have a proper nail trim. At times, I felt like a blade at the tip of my neck. Never have I feared for my life in a sock. Melissa spelled trouble, and it sucked that I was going to spend my night at her place.
         "I'M HOME!" Melissa shouted. I was so lost in my mind that I wasn't keeping track of time. However long the walk and torture was, she finally made it back to her place. She seemed to have forgotten about me considering there was no more toying with my body. I crawled my way to the fabric of the sock, looking to see how the place looked. It didn't seem anymore different from how my house looked. A little small. All rooms on one floor, close together. Narrow hallway. Kitchen and living room were sort of a combined joint, and were the biggest room of them all.
         I was busy looking around that I didn't feel the force of Melissa's toes dragging me back into her domain. "No! Please!" My pleads were useless. I tried to hold onto the sweaty cloth, and before I was brought back under her greased-up toes, I heard one big laugh coming from above. "WELCOME TO YOUR NEW HOME!"
         She ran down the narrow hallway, stomping all over my body in the process, until she turned right into the second-to-the-last door. She then used the foot I was inside to kick her door closed. The movement of her foot pushed me down to her heel, and when she stepped, I was under excruciating pain. I wanted help, but there was no one around me who would even bother to acknowledge me.
         Freedom called, as Melissa released me from her sock prison. I limply rolled out of her sock, like a broken toy. I laid on the floor exhausted, with half my face looking around. Tons of Metal and Rock posters all over her wall, with a dresser with all the drawers half-open and overflowing with clothes. The floor was a complete mystery, half covered with clothes with the other half surrounded by complete trash. The lack of light under her bed was such a nightmare not needed to be explored.

1132211.title: The right choice?

11322111.content:
I was so close to freedom, until Rhonda came back into the room, eating a sandwich. She spotted me near her feet, and then mega kicked me back against the wall. "WELL, WELL, WELL, IF IT ISN'T MIKEY. SO YOU'VE TRIED TO ESCAPE, HUH?" I was regaining my strength from her kick.
         "Why did you kidnapped me?"
         "BECAUSE I'M HELPING OUT MAINE. SHE'S HAD NO IDEA WHAT SHE WAS DOING, ASKING YOU TO BE HER NEW BOYFRIEND."
         "Whatever. Can I just go home now? It's been a long day."
         "YOUR NOT GOING ANYWHERE, BUG. I'M GOING TO KEEP YOU, AND TORTURE YOU FOR AS LONG AS I LIVE." I didn't want to stay with this rebel, so I whipped up an idea.

THEN I WENT OVER MY MINUTES, AND MY MOM FIGURED IT OUT. NOW SHE HAS MY PHONE LOCKED AWAY IN HER DRAWER. SO I NEED YOU TO GO IN MY PARENT'S ROOM, AND GET MY PHONE BACK, AND IN RETURN, YOU'LL BE FREE."

         "Yes."
         "OK, SO LETS GET MOVING." She grabbed mine puny body, and went out the room.

         We were heading down the hall, into the far room in the right. Rhonda peeked inside, to see if anyone was in here. "OK, THE COAST IS CLEAR."
         "I've got a question."
         "MAKE IT QUICK!"
         "Since nobody's there, why don't you go inside?"
         "BECAUSE IF THEY COME BACK, I'LL BE SPOTTED, UNLIKE YOU. NO MORE QUESTIONS" Rhonda then pulls out a straw from her pocket.
         "What's that for?"
         "TO BLOW YOU IN THERE. NO MORE DAMN QUESTIONS!" She forcefully sticks me at the end, and places the other end between her lips. "REMEMBER, THE LEFT SIDE, SECOND DRAWER."
         "Ok." Rhonda then blows me out, and I'm soaring through the air, until I hit the top of the drawer. I spin my head around, seeing that Rhonda has already left. My mission was pretty easy, since I still had a little bit of rope floss from this morning. I tied the end of it to a comb, then dropping down like an explorer. I was getting close to the second drawer, until my rope snapped in two, and I free-fallen.
         The good news is I fell into my destination. The bad news was that it was completely dark & I couldn't find another way to escape. "Well this sucks, I wonder what I'm standing on?" I tried to move around with my hands out, trying to feel the phone. "Hey, I think this is it!" Moments later, some noises came into the room.
         "I'M FEELING A LITTLE BORED TODAY. I WONDER WHERE MY TAMPONS ARE?" I hear the woman scuffling through the room. It must have been Rhonda's mom. "NOW I REMEMBER." It wasn't long before she opened the drawer I was in. It was unfortunate for me that I was standing on a tampon! She took the tampon I was on, without even looking. I hanged dearly to the edge, trying not to fall.
         She then sat down, and turned the tampon horizontally, giving me time to regain balance. I awed in fear as I was now being slowly into a wet vagina. "This can't be happening!" The last thing I saw were the hairy lips, and then I was inside her vagina.

         I held on to the tampon, not even opening my eyes for nothing. The juices were covering my entire body. Some even got into my mouth. But it wasn't long till she finally took it out. she threw the used tampon, and me, into the disposal bin. I climbed out, all covered in wet juices of a vagina & the smudges of waste from the family's restroom time. Where should I go now? Confront Rhonda and hope she understands? Or run for an exit before anyone else finds you?

***30 minutes later***

I wonder if she even cares if I'm gone? What's with all these questions? Damn it!" I was arguing with myself, not noticing the sounds of footsteps approaching the door. "Holy crap! I better hide!"          "NOW WHERE ARE MY FLATS?" My smile faded, as the words of her mouth finally got to my brain.
         "I picked a bad day to spy." I see the mom located her flats, and was walking towards them. She flipped them from their side position, forcing me to fall straight inside. Seconds later, I sighted a tremendous foot, entering the shoe. "There's no way that foot could fit in here!" But alas, I was wrong, as it actually did fit, and now I was trapped against her aging toes. "First her vagina, now her toes? What's wrong with my life?" She starts to walk her way out, calling out to Rhonda.
         "RHONDA, COME ON. LET'S GO."
         "Rhonda's coming too? This escape is just getting harder and harder." I tried to make the most of it, by making some space for me to sleep until they arrived to their destination. It wasn't so easy, as Rhonda's mom dig her toes in deep, feeling something.
         "IS THAT A PEBBLE IN MY SHOE?" She kept rubbing her toes on me, just to make sure. "IT IS A PEBBLE! IT FEEL SO COMFORTABLE, THOUGH. MIGHT AS WELL KEEP IT IN THERE." Non-stop, she was clenching me within the grasp of her carnivorous toes.
         "I knew school wasn't right for me yet. Now look what's happened to my life." After an estimate of 25 minutes, she finally stopped her playfulness. I assumed we've got to our destination.

         Rhonda's mom began to walk again, until she stand before the door. She was scrunching my face, as she was waiting. Then, I hear the door hinge squeak, a couple of greeting, and another walk. She once again stopped, and added more force to her foot. "She must be sitting down." After a harsh time for me, and a wonderful conversation for her, her friend asks a satisfying question.
         "HEY WANNA GO TO THE JACUZZI? I JUST GOT IT FIXED."

11322112.title: Leonardo's Room.

Eventually, he let his pressure off of me and began to roll me under his sole. I was getting even more of his grime, and all he could do was laugh from above. My true purpose was to be nothing more than an amusement to people. But to this kid, I was just a tool. I was nothing more but a foot toy for him. Maybe with Rhonda, I would've experienced a fresh-scented punishment. But with this kid, I have to deal with his man stink and foul body odor.
         Eventually, he stopped playing with my body, and gave me a rest. My body was stuck to the sock, with my face planted deeply within the fabric. He took off his sock, and then peeled me out. I could see his mischievous grin upon me, and he couldn't seem any more satisfied.
         "NOW DO YOU THINK OF ME AS A KID. I AM YOU MASTER NOW. AND I SAY WE KEEP ON GOING." What happened next?

I could only imagine how badly his dad's feet must reek. I could probably die from the smell in here. Worst of all, being kicked around in a soccer match would most likely rearrange my face. He tied up his cleats and started walking.
