I prepared for the worst, and felt the agonizing pain of her heel falling upon me. I could just scream about how much that hurt. I wanted to crawl back up, but after two smashes, I was just lifeless now. I couldn't do much anymore, and I could feel just how much fun she was enjoying. I concluded my fate from here, and just prayed to the heavens that I would be lucky enough to get out of this alive. My mouth was full of her sweat. My nostrils were sick of inhaling so much foot odor. My brain was hurting from all the walking. In an instant, I was already passed out.

         My eyes awake once again, and I could see that her foot was out of the shoe. Since I was near the heel, escape was just too easy. I jumped out of the shoe, realizing that I was inside her bedroom. I didn't know where her presence was, but I was too glad that this nightmare was over. Now I was just hoping that I could find someone to come and help me. I hear the shower running close by. Lois must have been taking a shower for now. She would expect to find me in her shoe later, but I had other plans. But before I could even react, a noise occurred. What happened?
1132212111111112122.title: Lois's Feet.

11322121111111121221.content:
I could see the door know wobble back and forth; realizing that someone was trying to get in. From my knowledge of the show, there could be only a few possibilities of who might be entering. Before I got even a chance to predict who it was, the door flew right open. It was Meg Griffin, the daughter that everyone else hates or ignores. She is the least favorite in the show, and she's also the most depressing. I just feel bad for her own existence. Then an idea came through my head. Since she lacks self-esteem, she might be able to help me out. I wave my arms frantically to gather her attention, but my size didn't cut it. There was only one thing I could have done. I run myself over to her body, where I encounter her legs and feet. She was wearing her usual jeans, but lack a pair of footwear. She was walking around barefooted, and the smell coming from her toes resembling a lot to sneaker shoes. I try to withstand the stench, but it was just too horrible to make ease with. I dropped down to my knees; accidently touched the sticky skin of her big toe. She soon noticed the touch, and tilted her head down. She was surprised, and fixed the position of her glasses to make sure she wasn't seeing things. She was now awing in amazement. I didn't know what to feel at the moment. I was too nervous to think what was going to happen next. Might as well ask.
         "Excuse me, girl. I need to ask you something."
         "WOW! YOU CAN TALK TOO? IS THIS A DREAM?"
         "No, this is not a dream. My name is Mikey, and I came from another universe. Would you mind helping me?" She just kept staring at me; completely ignoring my question. "Hey! Are you there?"
         "THIS IS TOO GOOD TO BE TRUE." She then reached out to get me. I tried to run, but her massive hands were too huge to run from. I squirmed in her plump fingers, and all she did was laugh at my struggles. I knew this was going to be bad.
         "Let me go! I don't have time for this!"
         "SORRY, KID, BUT YOU'RE KIND OF CUTE. BUT YOUR MY NEW BOYFRIEND. I HAVE BEEN ALONE FOR A WHILE. MAYBE IF YOUR NICE TO ME, I COULD HELP YOU. TIME TO HEAD TO MY ROOM." Meg then took me away from Lois's room, and down the hall to her room. She closed the door behind her, and I could see that this was the room of a teenage girl. Kind of reminded me of Mella's room, but without the Luke Perry poster on the wall. I kept squirming through her fingers, but her mighty squeeze forced me to resist. She then tossed me onto the bed, and began to take of everything except her bra, panties, and trademark hat. She slowly got onto the bed; crushing my under the immense weight of her boobs. I released myself, and stood a far distance from her.
         "MY NAME'S MEG. I'M YOUR NEW GIRLFRIEND SO BE HAPPY."
         "Yeah right. Like I'd go out with someone like you."
         "I DON'T THINK YOU SHOULD BE SAYING STUFF LIKE THAT, SINCE I'M CAPABLE TO CRUSHING YOUR WHOLE BEING INTO OBLIVION. NOW TELL ME THAT YOU LOVE ME."
         "I'd rather die!" She didn't say a word. Instead, she threw her body towards me, where I made a second contact with her enormous boobs. This time, she was pushing down force. She was meaning to suffocate me under the milky scent of her soft boobs. I try to push them off, but then they come back with much greater force. I wasn't in the mood; and neither was she. A couple more pounds, and she stopped the torture.
         "DO YOU WANT TO SAY THAT AGAIN, OR DIE THIS TIME?"
         "...No."
         "AWESOME! NOW DO YOU KNOW WHAT WOULD MAKE ME HAPPY RIGHT NOW, NEW BOYFRIEND?" What was Meg craving for?
11322121111111121221.title: Sexually Active Teenage Girl.

11322121111111122.content:
I opened my eyes to find myself on the Simpson's traditional brown couch. Normally I would never jump to such a conclusion if it weren't for the fact that everything literally looked like it was taken out from the cartoon show.

"Why do I have a sudden urge to shout out 'Do'h'?"

Suddenly, the ground started shaking, someone was coming. "I hope this isn't their opening family sit down!!" I screamed.

But no, instead of the entire family, it was a smaller number of yellow skinned giants. Turned out it was only...
11322121111111122.title: The Simpsons.

113221211111111221.content:
Patty and Selma, Marge's somewhat thick sisters, they were smoking as they always were. I thought maybe they could help me but I would recieve no such luck as they suddenly turn around to sit down on the couch. I tried to outrun their speeding glutts but ended up squashed underneath them anyways.

"Oh good, a McGuyver marathon is on." I heard Patty say.

"Good thing I bought an extra pack of cigarettes." Selma added.

Both sisters wiggled their behind left and right to get comfortable which was bad news for me. I underneath...
113221211111111221.title: Patty & Selma

choices: Yes. get their help after McGuyver is done.
No. the risks outweight any benefits.
1132212111111112212.content:
The blue dress told me that I was under Selma. Luckily for you, she had a soft behind and didn't crush you much, if at all. You chalked it up to the properties of the dimension you're in. If you remember right, Selma once wanted to get married and have children.

"Does the couch feel different to you" Selma asked Patty.

You heard Patty shuffle around and then reply with, "Hn. not really."

"I dunno.... Feels... a bit better for some reason." Selma said.

"Are you going to talk or are you going to watch McGuyver?" Patty asked.

"McGuyver." Selma replied.

A thought occurred to you. If Selma discovers you're under her after McGuyver is over, she might treat you like Maine did. Or she might decide to treat you like the husband or child that she once wanted, since you're so small that you can't really fight back.

Then again, if you declare that you hate Homer, Selma might actually help you find Stella.

Do you risk getting their attention once McGuyver is over?
1132212111111112212.title: Selma

113221212.content:
The woman obviously wasn't emotionally stable, and her mother was even worse. Going up would mean sheer death, at least I would have a 50/50 chance of surviving the drain. So I closed my eyes and plugged my nose and jumped down. The drain pipe treated me like a roller coaster only rougher, eventually it let out in to the sewer. After swimming to sewer canal to the edge I couldn't help but notice the sewer structure actually DID look like something out of the Ninja Turtles.

I pulled myself up and ringed out my clothes to the best of my ability. I sure hoped those rumors about rats and alligators in the sewer were exactly that, rumors. I looked down to my left, utter darkness, I looked down to my right, the same. Any direction was as good as the other, that is if I even DO decide to leave.

I could leave and hope to find some sewer worker, or a even a man hole or some other kind of exit. On the other hand, I could just wait here for someone to find me, after all my family does love me so it's only natural they would notice I was gone.

What to do?
113221212.title: Jump for dear life.

113222.content:
"I can't. I totally forgot about the stuff I have to do after school."
         "AW, WELL MAYBE SOME OTHER TIME."
         "Sounds fine with me, so what should we do no-" Suddenly the bell rang, signaling that class is over.
         "LOOKS LIKE OUR TIME IS DONE FOR TODAY. BYE, MIKEY." Then she came out to reach me. I was getting a little scared in the inside, thinking about what she was thinking of doing next. The next thing I knew was that I wasn't in any pain or scared. I see Maine giving me a gentle hug.
         "You didn't strangle me?"
         "WHY WHOULD I DO THAT?"
         "Um, never mind."
         "ANYWAYS, BYE." Then she planted a kiss upon my cheek, placed me back on solid ground, and left with a simple goodbye wave.
         "Bye, Maine." I felt like I was in love for the first time. I finally had a true friend.

         For the rest of the day, I was distracted. I couldn't keep my mind off of Maine. She was stuck in my head throughout each period. Though some girls tried to play around with my puny body, I wasn't really paying attention to them. Then when I was waiting for my ride, I started to hallucinate dancing with Maine. It wasn't till my mom's car almost squashed me. I quickly ran from the laughter from the other girls, and got into the car. "MIKEY, ARE YOU NUTS?! YOU COULD HAVE BEEN KILLED!"
         "Huh? Oh, I'm sorry, mom. I was just a little distracted."
         "WHY ARE YOU SO DISTRACTED?"
         "I met this really cool girl. Her name is Maine, and she's real sweet."
         "OH..." My mom pulled a quick grin on her face. "LOOKS LIKE SOMEONE IS EXPERIENCING THEIR FIRST CRUSH."
         "What? Don't be silly, mom. Were just friends, and its only been the first day." I was completely lying to myself.
         "SURE... BELIEVE WHAT YOU SAY. I CAN TELL YOU LIKE THIS GIRL JUST BY LOOKING AT YOUR SMILE. NOW LET'S GET HOME." For the rest of the trip home, I fell asleep, dreaming about Maine.

         When we got home, My mom tapped me in the head, getting me to wake up to leave. I jumped out of the car, humming in my head and snapping my fingers repeatedly. When I got into the house, Mella stopped in front of my path. "SO HOW WAS YOUR FIRST DAY, MIKEY?"
         "It was okay, I guess." My mom came to Mella's ears and deliver her some juicy news.
         "OH... SO NOTHING HAPPENED, HUH?"
         "What are you talking about?"
         "MOM JUST TOLD ME YOU GOT A NEW GIRLFRIEND."
         "What?! Mom!"
         "I'M JUST TELLING WHAT I'VE HEARD."
         "I've told you, were just friends." My mom ignored the last statement, and went into the kitchen.
         "SO DID YOU GUYS KISS YET?"
         "Mella, don't be silly! Well... she did give me a kiss on the cheek."
         "OH, REALLY?"
         "Well, it doesn't mean anything."
         "YES IT DOES, MIKEY. SHE'S TELLING YOU SHE WANTS TO BE WITH YOU."
         "You really think so?"
         "MIKEY, I KNOW THESE THINGS, AND TRUST ME, SHE WANTS YOU TO BE HERS."
         "Really? Then this is amazing!"
         "GLAD TO HELP, NOW LET'S GO EAT." The rest of my day was very pleasant. It was now time for me to get some sleep.
         "I can't wait till the next day!" Looks like this school year isn't going to be so horrible.

***2 weeks later***

         Two weeks since my encounter with Maine, and everything was awesome. During these weeks, we've been hanging out with each other more often, and we really got to know each other pretty well. Then one day in class, some pretty good announcements came up. "WOW, MIKEY. YOU'VE REALLY COME A LONG WAY. NOW I TAUGHT YOU EVERYTHING I KNOW."
         "Thanks, Maine." We both gave each other a hug.
         "NOW MIKEY, SINCE THESE LAST TWO WEEKS, I'VE BEEN THINKING..." my face was stunned.
         "Really?"
         "YES, AND NOW I HAVE THE GUTS TO SAY IT. MIIKEY. WILL YO-"
         "LADIES AND GENTLEMEN!" Damn! So close to hearing those amazing words! Why did Ms. Oruppy have to ruin everything?! "BECAUSE OF MIKEY, I WOULD LIKE TO SAY THAT ROMEO AND JULIET AUDITIONS ARE GOING TO BE RUNNING AFTER SCHOOL, SO BE THERE IF YOU'D LIKE TO JOIN. ALSO, I'VE INVITED SOME OF THE BEST ACTORS FROM OTHER SCHOOLS TO PARTICIPATE IN THIS PLAY."
         "THAT'S SO AWESOME! MIKEY, WE'VE GOT TO JOIN!"
         "But weren't you going to say something first?"
         "OH, YEAH. MIKEY, WOULD YOU TUTOR ME IN MATH?"
         "What?"
         "YEAH. I SECRETLY SEEN YOUR GRADES, AND I JUST NEED THE HELP. SO WILL YOU?" I was disappointed in the inside.
         "Um, sure."
         "THANKS! YOUR A REAL FRIEND." She planted yet another kiss on me. "REMEMBER TO COME AFTER SCHOOL SO WE CAN TRY OUT."
         "It's a deal." The bell rang, and we've parted ways to our next class.

***6 hours later***

         I came across Maine in the back of the auditorium, standing in line. She found me, and picked me up onto her shoulder. "WHAT PART ARE YOU GOING FOR, MIKEY?"
         "I'm going for Romeo, of course."
         "THAT'S COOL."
         "What are you going for, Maine?"
         "I'M GONIG TO TRY FOR JULIET, OF COURSE. HEHE."
         "NEXT!"
         "Looks like that's us. Best of luck for both of us."
         "TRUE THAT." Then we both entered the auditorium.

***30 minutes later***

          We've both left the stage, talking. "OMG, MIKEY! I'VE GOT THE PART! I'VE GOT JULIET!"
         "That's great, Maine!"
         "WHAT PART DID YOU GET?"
113222.title: A true friend.

1132222.content:
"I got pebble #1." There was a long pause.
         "OH. WELL... THAT'S STILL COOL."
         "No it's not cool. It's lame. The only reason I didn't get the part of Romeo was because of my size. I hate being small!"
         "DON'T TALK LIKE THAT. NOW, WHO NEEDS A HUG?"
         "I do." I was going for a hug, until I was cut off and kicked into an empty lunch bag.
         "HEY!" I poked my head out to see who did that, and I couldn't believe it. It was the guy who got my role, Daniel. He was tall, having a lightly, tan skin, and with a perfected fade haircut.
         "WHAT'S UP, MAINE! HEARD YOU GOT JULIET'S PART."
         "UM, YEAH. I DID."
         "WELL I GOT ROMEO."
         "THAT'S GREAT, DANIEL. NOW CAN YOU LEAVE?"
         "BUT WE GOT TO PRACTICE. WE CAN GO TO MY MANSION TO PRACTICE."
         "YOU GOT A MANSION?"
         "YEAH. I'M RICH."
         "She not going to fall for him. She too good for that."
         "WELL NOW THAT YOU SAY THAT, I'D LOVE TO GO AND PRACTICE WITH YOU."
         "GREAT! LET'S GET GOING. MY LIMO'S WAITING." The two left, leaving me in the bag.
         "She just left me..." I was now heart-broken. "I just hope this doesn't change anything. Were still friend's, right?" I came out of the bag, only to find rain pouring down on my misery. "Oh..." I walked back to the parking lot, locating my mom's car, and got in.
         "HOW WERE THE AUDITIONS, HONEY?"
         "Fine."
         "WHAT PART DID YOU GET?"
         "A stupid pebble."
         "AW. SORRY TO HEAR THAT HONEY, BUT THAT'S JUST SHOW BUSINESS."
         "Whatever."
         "WHAT PART DID MAINE GET?"
         "Juliet."
         "THAT'S WONDERFUL! WHO HER ROMEO?"
         "Mom! Enough with the questions!" The car suddenly stopped.
         "WHAT YOUR PROBLEM? I'M JUST WONDERING. DID SOMETHING HAPPENED?"
         "No. Nothing freakin' happened, okay?"
         "FINE! I'LL STOP ASKING. BUT YOU BETTER CHEER UP SOON."
         "I hope so too, mom." The rest of the drive home was quiet.

         When we got home, I got out of the car, called Snout, and headed to my room. I pulled myself up to my bed, lay down, and started at the ceiling till it was dark. My mom came in, trying to comfort me. "HEY, SWEETIE. HOW YOU FEELING."
         "I'm fine, mom. Just fine. Now can I just be alone?"
         "NOT UNTIL YOU TELL ME WHAT HAPPENED AT THE AUDITIONS THAT MADE YOU SO DEPRESSED."
         "Ok. It because of the guy who got Romeo's part."
         "WHO IS HE?"
         "A guy named Daniel."
         "THAT'S A NICE NAME."
         "Mom..."
         "RIGHT. SORRY." I rolled my eyes.
         "Anyways, he cut me off and kicked me into an empty lunch bag."
         "THAT'S AWFUL!"
         "That's not the worst part. He wooed Maine with his 'mansion' and she fell for it."
         "HE'S RICH?"
         "That's what he says."
         "THAT'S NICE."
         "Mom! That's not the point! After they left, I felt a pain inside my chest, and it hasn't healed since."
         "OH. YOUR HEART-BROKEN."
         "You think? Because I'm mad too."
         "THAT'S JEALOUSY, DEAR."
         "Oh. Well I don't know if anything will change things."
         "DON'T THINK LIKE THAT, SWEETIE. NOTHING GOING TO CHANGE BETWEEN YOU TWO. YOU GUYS WILL STILL BE THE BEST OF FRIENDS. NOW IT'S TIME FOR BED. YOU'LL SEE. BY TOMORROW, EVERYTHING WILL BE JUST AS IT IS."
         "Your right, mom. I'm just thinking to hard."
         "THAT'S RIGHT. NOW GOODNIGHT, SWEETIE."
         "Goodnight, mom." My mom tucked me in, and left the room, allowing me to snooze.

         I was in dream mode, and it was starting off good. I was in a picnic with Maine, having a rousing of a time. I was munching on a triple cheeseburger, while she was chewing on a light salad. "I'M HAVING A GREAT TIME, MIKEY."
         "So am I, Maine." After our meals, we were sipping on a orange soda.
         "MIKEY, I HAVE SOMETHING TO TELL YOU."
         "Yes, Maine?"
         "I WAS THINKING IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO BECOME MY BOYFRIEND."
         "Really??"
         "WELL, YEAH. YOUR SO SWEET, SO FUNNY, AND KNOWS HOW TO MAKE A RAVISHING BOWL OF SALAD."
         "Hehe. Well thanks! And I'd love to be your girlfriend!"
         "YOU JUST ME SUPER HAPPY! NOW LET'S MAKE OUT." We were about to kiss, until a unknown alarm set off.
         "MAINE, COME WITH ME... I GOT MONEY..." I turn east to see a magnificent large mansion, with Daniel standing to the side of the gate.
         "COMING, DANIEL!" She was walking towards Daniel, but I tried to stop her by jumping on her leg.
         "Maine, wait! What about me?" She knocked to the ground, then raising her foot.
         "SORRY, BUT I CHANGE MY MIND. WHO COULD EVER LOVE A BUG?"
         "No!!!" Then before she squashed me, I woke up, hearing the alarm go off. "Uh..Uh..." I was out of breath. "It was just a dream. But what if it does happen?" I was terrified to find out this day. Was everything going to actually change because of this one guy?
1132222.title: Cut off.

choices: Days pass by; Night of the play.
11322221.content:
As a matter fact, my life became horrible. In the morning, Daniel was clouding my mind with nightmares. I got down to the dinner table, shaking in fear. "IS EVERYTHING ALL RIGHT, HONEY?"
         "Yes, mom. I'm just fine."
         "YOU SURE? I MEAN, YOUR JUST SHAKING."
         "Everything' all right , mom. I just get a little spooked when I don't get my milk and cereal."
         "OK... WELL HURRY IT UP, THEN. YOU GOT TO GET TO CLASS." I spent my time sipping my cup of milk, still shaking with the thought of Daniel haunting me.

         In homeroom, things got worse. I was still shaking as Ms.Tamal was calling for attendance. "MIKEY?" I didn't spoke a word. "MIKEY?" I was still in shock. "MIKEY!?"
         "Here, miss!" My voice screeched in anger at Ms.Tamal.
         "IS EVERYTHING ALL RIGHT, MIKEY?"
         "Everything is peachy keen. Why you ask?"
         "WELL ITS JUST YOU ANSWERED ME IN A ANGRY TONE."
         "Oh. sorry. It's just I get a little cranky in the morning.
         "WELL, IF YOU SAY SO..." I haven't felt this embarrassed in a while. I need to get my act together. I had to think positive.

***50 minutes later***

         The bell rang, as it was time for second period. I was heading my way to drama class, thinking how everything will turn out. "Things will be the same. Nothing will change. I'm just hallucinating." As I enter the class, there she was. The heroine in my fantasies. I saw her just sitting there, texting on her phone. I took a deep, relaxing breath, and walked up to her table. Without any assistance, I climbed up the table leg, reaching the top, and approaching her face. I lightly tapped her on the arm, but she was too busy with her phone. I tired a better tap, but still no response. Then I just called her name. "Maine?"
         "HUH? OH, MIKEY. WHAT'S UP?"
         "Oh, nothing much. Just here. And you?"
         "SAME AS YOU. HEHE."
         "So, uh, how was Daniel's house?"
         "OH MY GOD, IT WAS SO FUN! HE'S HAS A LOT OF REALLY COOL STUFF! BOWLING ALLEY, BOXING RING, YOU NAME IT! HEY, UH, WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU AFTER WE LEFT?"
         "Oh, I just walked home."
         "WELL ITS GOOD YOU MADE IT SAFE AND SOUND. HEHE."
         "Ok, well, we got that math tutoring today. Say, at my house?"
         "HUH? OH, THE TUTORING. ABOUT THAT..."
         "What?"
         "I DECIDED TO HAVE DANIEL TUTOR ME, SINCE WE GOT THE SHOW IN A WEEK, SO WE GOT TO PRACTICE TOO."
         "Oh, that sounds cool."
         "ARE YOU OKAY WITH IT?"
         "Of course I am. If it makes you happy, then I'm happy."
         "AWW. YOUR SO SWEET. THANKS." For the rest of the class, I worked on some assignments from my other classes, while Maine texted all period. When the bell rung, she quickly left. I saw a pin fall from her head, decorated with colorful stings.
         "Maine, you dropped this!" She didn't hear me, and left the room. I acted fast, grabbed the pin, climbed down, and ran out the door. I found Maine walking slowly, and still texting. I caught up to her, only to be hit by her heel. I started to get my nose bleeding, and watched as Maine walked out of view. "Looks like things really did change." I kept the pin, knowing it was the only thing I had left of her. I walked back into the class to get my belongings, then the bell rang, as I was late for class. The rest of the day, I was real depressed, thinking if things will go back to the way they used to be. Even when I got home, I locked myself in my room, and just slept away my troubles. I just hope the play wasn't as bad as this day.
11322221.title: Rough Changes.

1133.content:
"YOUR OWN DESK. IT'S IN THE VERY BACK."

She held you in her palm as she moved you past the snickering girls until they came upon the windowcill. There sat a small barbie desk exactly your size.

"SORRY THAT IT'S PINK!!"

"Oh no the fact that you found anything in my size is amazing alone!" you beamed.

Satisfied with your answer she moved back to the front of the class and sat down at her own desk.

"MIKEY!! CAN YOU HEAR ME BACK THERE?!" Ms. Tamal's voice boomed.

"Yes. I can hear you just fine." you shouted back.
1133.title: "YOUR OWN DESK."

11331.content:
Even though you said you could hear fine, you felt yourself being lifted up.

Which girl was it?
11331.title: A student snatches you

11333.content:
Class went by rather quickly, you enjoyed the fact that there were no mishaps involving you. The bell rung signaling the end of the period, you checked your schedule and smiled at your next class. A shadow was casted over you and you look up to see the plesant form of Ms. Tamal.

"Mikey, I was told by the Principal to help you get to your next class."

"That's great Ms. Tamal!"

"What do you have next?"
11333.title: Class goes on uninterrupted

info.brief_description: The tale of Mikey Shripo, who was born only a mere inch
info.description:
June 2015 -- Looking for reviews! I want to get some feedback on how this story is going so far. If it isn't too much to ask, I would like if all would take the time to tell me what they like, what they like to see, etc. Thank you and Enjoy!

This is the story of Mikey shripo. Here's a little details about him and his family.

Mikey Shripo: A 14 year old teen starting high school. He only one inch tall for some strange reason. He has a powerful stamina and the ability to not die. He lives with his Mother and sister. His dad left because he couldn't handle the parenting life.

Delilah Shripo: A 40 year old woman. Mother of the Shripo residence. she is a nurse at a clinic for senior sitizens. She takes more care of Mikey for his special condition.

Mella Shripo: An 18 year old young adult. She is Mikey's older sister. She had recently finished high school, and studys fashion at a nearby school of design and technology. She is bossy and dosen't get along with you that much, mostly because you get more attention.

More characters will be in the story.
I'll allow anything except:
- Caveman writing (acceptional for toddlers)


Hope you have fun!
You Don't have to add, but it would be surely helpful to rate this story and send me e-mails of what more you guys want to see.
info.pretty_title: The Horrid Life of Mikey Shripo.
